截.definition: to cut off (a length); to stop; to intercept; section; chunk; length

截取.definition: to cut off a section of sth

截尾.definition: to dock; to trim (esp. the tail of an animal)

截拳道.definition: Jeet Kun Do or Way of the Intercepting Fist, a fusion of Eastern and Western martial arts led by Bruce Lee 李小龍|李小龙[Li3 Xiao3 long2]

截斷.definition: to break or cut in two; to sever; to cut off; (fig.) to cut off (a conversation, a flow etc); to interrupt; (math.) to truncate

截止到.definition: (before an expression indicating a point of time) up to (that point); as of (that time)

截止至.definition: (before an expression indicating a point of time) up to (that point); as of (that time)

截然不同.definition: entirely different; different as black and white

截獲.definition: to intercept; to cut off and capture

截稿.definition: (of a newspaper) to stop accepting incoming articles

截距.definition: intercept (the point at which a line crosses the x- or y-axis)

截長補短.definition: take from the long to supplement the short (idiom); to offset each other's deficiencies; to complement each other
